dialogueContent.words: The disused stronghold that Colonel Lees and his band of war criminals have holed up in should be just ahead of you, Commander.
I want you to go in with guns blazing and pull the whole structure down on top of Lees. Bury that rat bastard under a ton of rubble—he's more than earned it.
I raise my glass to you and your lance, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Bring that son of a bitch to justice.
The base is down, Commander. Good work.
Sorry to butt in, but we just received a message from Colonel Lees. I hate to say it, but it looks authentic.
What? But… he should be dead! Buried in a mountain of scrap!

Damn it. Nothing's ever as easy as it should be. All right, Sumire—keep the bastard on hold. When our people are all present and accounted for, we'll have words with him. Shugo Yamaguchi, I suggest that you stay on the line as well.
I will, but to listen only. I have nothing to say to that murderous swine.
Quitting the field, eh? Go on and run, then. Run back to your Kurita masters like the lickspittle coward you are.
Watch yourself, Boss. It looks like Lees just called in the cavalry.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

longDescription: You heard what Lees did on Shaul Khala. The galaxy will be a better place without a man like him in it.
shortDescription: My agents have traced Colonel Basil Lees to a stronghold in the basin ahead. I want you to raze it to the ground, and destroy anything that attempts to protect it. Show this Davion animal what the Draconis Combine does to those who would slaughter its people.
